recipe.name: Potato: Barbecue Style Potatoes

ingredient_list.ingredient: 6 medium unpeeled potatoes cut into 4 wedges

recipe.directions: Cut potatoes crosswise at 1/4 inch intervals to within 1/4 inch from bottom of potatoes. Place in ice water 1 hour, and then dry. Mix rest of ingredients. Place potatoes on baking sheet. Brush with half the catsup mixture. Bake in 425 oven, brushing occasionally with remaining mixture, for 35 minutes or until tender.

recipe.name: Potato: Nauvoo (Funeral) Potatoes
recipe.directions: Boil, cool, peed, and shred potatoes into a casserole (microwaving works too). Blend soup, sour cream, melted butter, cheese, and onion. Cover potatoes with sauce. Top with bread crumbs combined with butter. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.

recipe.name: Potato: Rosemary Potatoes
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 450. Rinse and cut potatoes into 1 inch pieces. Place potatoes and spices into ziploc bag and shake well to coat. Spread to a single layer in baking pan and bake for 30 minutes, stirring when half done.

recipe.name: Sweet Potatoes

ingredient_list.ingredient: 6 pounds sweet potatoes (fill 6 quart pressure cooker)
1 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice or (since I never have pumpkin pie spice):

recipe.directions: Topping 1/4 cup brown sugar 1/2 cup chopped pecans 3 tablespoons melted butter
Boil potatoes until just tender, then drain and mash with spices. Put in 9x13 baking dish. Mix topping ingredients together and spread over potatoes. Heat in 400 degree oven for 25 minutes
